faqs.question: What is the typical appreciation rate for a shop for sale in Sector 84
faqs.answer: The appreciation rate in Sector 84 Gurugram is currently quite strong often exceeding 10-15% annually especially as the Dwarka Expressway project nears full completion. faqs.question: Are there specific commercial segments performing better in Sector 84
faqs.answer: High-street retail facing the main thoroughfares generally provides the highest visibility and rental yield. Essential services such as grocery stores chemists and food and beverage outlets located near residential entry points show strong resilience and occupancy. Double-height showrooms are also performing exceptionally well attracting premium tenants like automotive dealers and furniture outlets due to the high ceiling advantage and grand display potential.

faqs.question: What kind of tenant profile can I expect for a retail unit here
faqs.answer: Sector 84 attracts a mix of national chains local brands and essential service providers. Given the high consumer spending power of the surrounding residents you can expect premium tenants including multinational banks high-end cafes fitness centers and large format apparel stores ensuring long lease periods and reliable rental income generation which minimizes investor risk.

faqs.question: What documents should I verify before purchasing a commercial property
faqs.answer: It is crucial to verify the project's RERA registration status the developer's track record and the clear title deed of the land. Additionally examine the approved building plan the occupancy certificate (if ready-to-move) or the commencement certificate (if under construction) and the specific floor plans related to your shop unit to ensure full compliance and avoid future legal issues or discrepancies.

faqs.question: Is Sector 84 considered a safe investment given the large supply of commercial space
faqs.answer: While there is supply Sector 84 is unique because the residential demand far outweighs the current retail supply dedicated to serving this density. The commercial offerings are highly strategic focusing on high-street formats rather than enclosed malls which mitigates oversupply concerns. Its location on the key expressway corridor ensures demand remains robust making it a safer long-term investment option in the Gurugram region.

faqs.question: What are the maintenance charges like for commercial complexes in Sector 84
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges vary based on the project developer and the amenities offered such as central air conditioning security and common area upkeep. Typically these charges range from INR 15 to INR 25 per square foot per month. Investors should factor this into their financial projections as tenants sometimes bear these costs depending on the specific lease agreement structure negotiated at the time of tenancy.
